title: MSCSE.1
text: The student will design and iteratively develop programs that combine control structures, including loops and conditionals.
subject: Computer Science (2017)

title: MSCSE.2
text: The student will investigate variables and data types, including simple operations on strings.
subject: Computer Science (2017)

title: MSCSE.3
text: The student will implement a program that accepts input values, stores them in appropriately named variables, and produces output.
subject: Computer Science (2017)

title: MSCSE.4
text: The student will document programs in order to make them easier to trace, test, and debug.
subject: Computer Science (2017)

title: MSCSE.7
text: The student will use flowcharts and/or pseudocode to address complex problems as algorithms.
subject: Computer Science (2017)

title: MSCSE.8
text: The student will incorporate existing code, media, and libraries into original programs, and give attribution.
subject: Computer Science (2017)

title: MSCSE.9
text: The student will systematically test and refine programs using a range of test cases.
subject: Computer Science (2017)

title: MSCSE.21
subject: Computer Science (2017)
subs: work in a team to distribute tasks;
use iterative design to solve problems, including peer review and feedback.

title: MSCSE.22
text: The student will decompose problems and subproblems into parts to facilitate the design, implementation, and review of programs.
subject: Computer Science (2017)

title: MSCSE.23
text: The student will create procedures with parameters to organize code and make it easier to reuse.
subject: Computer Science (2017)
